full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Upgrading HySpex Short-Wave-Infrared Radiation (SWIR) Sensor to Mjolnir VS-620

## Solicitation Number: 23-58279

### Description:
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking a supplier to upgrade its existing Hyspex Mjolnir V1240 sensor (to be added to the current S-620) and Mjolnir S-620 to Mjolnir VS-620 specification. The upgraded system must be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario.

### Background:
The upgrade project aims to enhance the Earth Observation and Microgravity Group (EOMG) of the NRC with a cutting-edge imaging system. The NRC is committed to collaborating with qualified suppliers to ensure successful project execution.

### Requirements:

* Supply 1x HySpex Mjolnir V1240 sensor
* Upgrade 1x Mjolnir S-620 to Mjolnir VS-620 specification

### Notice of Tender:
This Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) compliant tender announcement is a call for suppliers to demonstrate their interest in participating in the upgrade project. Suppliers who believe they possess the necessary capabilities to meet the NRC's requirements are invited to submit a statement of capabilities (optional) by the closing date (April 8th, 2024).

### Important Dates:
* Publication Date: March 22nd, 2024
* Closing Date: April 8th, 2024
